io.netty.handler.codec.http

Interface FullHttpMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ByteBufHolder, HttpContent, HttpMessage, HttpObject, LastHttpContent, ReferenceCounted
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FullHttpRequest, FullHttpResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFullHttpRequest, DefaultFullHttpResponse

    public interface FullHttpMessage
extends HttpMessage, LastHttpContent
    Combines HttpMessage and LastHttpContent into one message. So it represent a complete http message.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.netty.handler.codec.http.LastHttpContent

        EMPTY_LAST_CONTENT

    • Method Summary

      Create a deep copy of this ByteBufHolder.

      Increases the reference count by 1.

      Increases the reference count by the specified increment.
